channel.title: CVE Feed for WPZOOM -- WPZOOM Shortcodes

item.title: CVE-2024-22162|2024-08-22T09:53:43.273Z -- wpzoom -- wpzoom%20shortcodes
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPZOOM WPZOOM Shortcodes allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WPZOOM Shortcodes: from n/a through 1.0.3.
